text: South Korea feels like another world
things are different here it has a
homogeneous culture with a lot of funny
and wacky things that's different than
anywhere on earth I've gotten to know
Korean culture fairly well after living
and teaching English here for two years
I've been back every year since I left
and I'm still amazed by the uniqueness
of this country this toilet seat heats
up your butt here are 12 wacky things in
mind about Korean culture one restaurant
etiquette hands are dirty chances are
you'll be using toilet paper to clean
them need to call the waiter just press
this button and someone will come
immediately need to cut your food use
scissors which makes life easier and
safer than knives also they sometimes
sit on the floor to eat too afraid of
the Sun in the Western world a tan is
considered attractive in South Korea
it's exactly the opposite they want to
look as white as possible and they even
use whitening cream organ injections to
make their skin whiter three selfie
madness Koreans take more selfies than
anyone I've ever seen selfie sticks are
rampant among the young and the old
Charlie mentioned the word narcissist
for everything is Samsung or LG as
Korean companies called Samsung and LG
rule the universe in Korea phones TVs
computers air conditioning washing
machines and even cars are Samsung five
matching couples it's fashionable to
dress up identically to your boyfriend
or girlfriend can you imagine the
comments you get if you did this back in
the States
they also go all out on winter clothes
even when it's not that cold
I mean it's 35 Fahrenheit today and the
dress like there in Antarctica six
double hem one hand isn't enough to say
goodbye Koreans use two hands also out
of respect they use two hands when
pouring a shot to someone older than you
7 their age is different when Koreans
are born they are one and everyone gains
one year on New Year's Day so if you're
born on December 31st the very next day
you turn to it's hard enough for me to
tell their age because they all look
very young it just makes it harder 8
dancing in clubs no words I needed to
describe the way Koreans dance just
watch
[Music]
9 slurping noodles when eating noodles
at a restaurant
Green is allowed as humanly possible
it's not gonna happen I still can't
understand this tent plastic surgery
Club Med Ixtapa of milk chocolate milk
shelf of milk some cosmetic shop South
Korea is the number-one country in the
world for plastic surgery and it's all
from the neck up girls want to make
their eyes bigger and nose taller even
my old middle school students we're
getting plastic surgery 11 communal hand
soap many bathrooms have bar soaps to
share I only find hairs on them and I
feel like they're making my hands more
dirty than clean so weird 12 soft &
phone cave doors this entire store sells
only thoughts and this stores only phone
cases talk about specialized stories
Seoul streets are filled with sock
stores and phones a stores trends come
and go faster than you can imagine as
quirky as it seems
South Korea is truly an amazing place to
visit and one that should be added to
your bucket list
